pullRequest.title: [BEAM-10559] Add apache_beam.examples.sql_taxi
pullRequest.bodyText:
Add a streaming example for SqlTransform in python. The example processes public NYC taxi data and writes it to a user-defined PubSub topic.
Update SqlTransform docstring to reference sql_taxi example and beam.Row

Tested on Dataflow with 2.23.0-RC2. Job id 2020-07-28_13_56_21-2722733920056805481
R: @chamikaramj, @robertwb

commit.message:
Update SqlTransform docstring

Add beam.Row, reference sql_taxi

nodes.bodyText: Please mention perquisites and runner specific information similar to https://github.com/apache/beam/blob/master/sdks/python/apache_beam/examples/wordcount_xlang_sql.py#L20
